channel.title: Getting Items into my Inventory?!?!
channel.description:
Okay so I understand that I need to put a number in the notepad to get the item into my inventory, but where do i put it? I tried to put it in the character file as:
[ITEM] character-item = 0 1490 1
What do I put there? Please explain, thanks a lot.

item.title: Getting Items into my Inventory?!?!
item.dc:creator: @animalnt animalnt
item.description:
@animalnt wrote:

try this:

if(itemUseID == 1231 && playerRights >= 3) {
p2.addItem(0995, 10000);
p2.sendMessage("You are given 10k!");
}

mess around with that, put it in with all the other itemUseID’s and see the:

p2 = otherPlayer, addItem = Add Item then (itemid, ammount) the . tells the code to specify with the other statement.

p2.addItem(0995, 10000);

so just use that on the other player, enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Items into my Inventory?!?!
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

To get a item in your inventory you must use ::pickup (item code here) and you will get the item in your inventory.
